name: Apocalypse TP
description:
*Warning: Lower volume before playing*

The Plague Doctor needs toilet paper, however, it seems that shopping for the priceless artifacts may be a challenge as the Others (with their very protective face masks) want to steal Plague Doctor's stash.  Try to survive the TP Apocalypse...

Controls:

W/ Up arrow = move up

A/ left arrow = move left

S/ Down arrow = move down

D/ right arrow = move right

Goal: 

Collect the Toilet Paper and don't get caught by the Others. The More TP you collect, the faster the Others get

Music:

Run - Max Surla / Media Right Productions

Astronomia Remix- Artist can be found at this link: 

All Visual Art Assets were done myself

Notable Bugs (working to get them fixed):

Sometimes the randomly spawning walls will box you in, just restart the game

Sometimes you can get stuck between walls, so be careful before proceeding between to walls 

Made with Godot Game Engine
